profitPerCycle: Estimated profit over {{totalDays}} days for {{totalSeeds}} crops
option.totalSeeds.name: Number of Seeds
option.totalSeeds.tooltip: Sets the number of seeds used to calculate the total profit for each planting cycle.
option.showOriginalDescription.name: Display Original Item Description
option.showOriginalDescription.tooltip: Shows the default description of the item, as provided by the game.
option.showSeasonDescription.name: Display Planting Seasons
option.showSeasonDescription.tooltip: Shows the seasons during which the crop can be planted.
option.showHarvestInDaysDescription.name: Display Harvest Time
option.showHarvestInDaysDescription.tool: Shows how many days it takes for the crop to be ready for harvest.
option.showRegrowDescription.name: Display Regrowth/Replanting Info
option.showRegrowDescription.tooltip: Shows whether the crop regrows after harvest or needs to be replanted.
option.showIsRaised.name: Display Trellis Growth Information
option.showIsRaised.tooltip: Shows if the crop requires a trellis to grow.
option.showHarvestAverageStack.name: Display Crops Per Harvest
option.showHarvestAverageStack.tooltip: Shows how many crops (on average) can be harvested from one plant each harvest.
option.showBuyPriceDescription.name: Display Seed Purchase Price
option.showBuyPriceDescription.tooltip: Shows the cost to purchase the seeds.
option.showSellPriceDescription.name: Display Harvest Selling Price
option.showSellPriceDescription.tooltip: Shows the selling price of the harvested crops.
option.showProfitPerCycleDescription.too: Shows the estimated profit generated for the full planting cycle, considering the number of seasons the crop can grow. For crops that span multiple seasons (e.g., Wheat, 2 seasons, 56 days), the profit is calculated over the total number of days.
option.showProfitabilityDescription.name: Display Profitability Index
option.showProfitabilityDescription.tool: Shows the profitability rate for each planting cycle, indicating efficiency and return on investment.
